hero.title: Bridging Web3 Innovation Between Korea and the World
hero.subtitle: Connecting Korean blockchain projects with global opportunities through strategic partnerships, expert guidance, and comprehensive support services.

about.title: About Web3 Korea Bridge
about.subtitle: Your gateway to Web3 success in Korea and beyond

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To accelerate the adoption and success of Web3 technologies by providing seamless connections between Korean innovators and the global blockchain ecosystem.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where geographic boundaries don't limit innovation, where Korean Web3 projects can easily access global markets and international projects can tap into Korea's dynamic blockchain landscape.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Web3 solutions for Korean and international projects

consulting.title: Strategic Consulting
consulting.description: Expert guidance on blockchain strategy, tokenomics, and market entry

localization.title: Market Localization
localization.description: Cultural adaptation and regulatory compliance for Korean market entry

partnerships.title: Partnership Development
partnerships.description: Connecting projects with strategic partners, investors, and communities

technical.title: Technical Support
